title: Leather Cloth
description: 3/8\" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. 3/16-3/8\" Black, grey & white leather strips weft.  .25\" of black & white weft threads at top. Staples to 11 x 8.50\" card with 99.1012.18.  \"H-3\" printed on card. (black, grey white)
